name: Midnight Shift Remake
description:
Synopsis

Step back into the shoes of an unfortunate security guard who encounters strange things while simply leaving for the night. Expect about 15 minutes of game play across both modes, each with a unique ending, and even more play time if you're looking to uncover the secret ending (Extended Scenario).

Development

This was a one-person portfolio project. I initially started work on this project but I canceled it in favor of a different project called Urbex. After getting good reception on the original Midnight Shift, it was motivation enough to restart the project. Not only did I recreate the original game but I created an all-new scenario that is even more creepy.

Enjoy the remake and thanks for playing!

  • Midnight Shift
  • Urbex
  • CyberSiege VR

View my other works: md-pd.weebly.com
